v.description: Edit Packet version. This schema defines version 1.

tid.description: Optional trace identifier to associate the packet with external metadata.

h.description: Page-level content hash, computed using the algorithm specified by ha (or the default baseline when ha is omitted).

ha.description: Hash algorithm identifier for h and block textHash values. Implementations MUST support "sha256" as a baseline; other values are allowed for extensibility.

b.description: Blocks in reading order as tuples: [blockId, kindCode, textHash, text].

kindCode.description: Block importance code. Ranges: 0–19 core, 20–39 boilerplate/nav, 40–59 UI chrome, 99 unknown.

textHash.description: Hash of the block text, computed using the algorithm specified by ha (or the default baseline when ha is omitted).
